metadata.Title: CVE-2022-0326 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - low.
metadata.Description: NULL Pointer Dereference in Homebrew mruby prior to 3.2.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> mruby is not built in the nghttp2 packages in Ubuntu

criterions.comment: cargo: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
